Kaike Melt Cleansing Oil (2020 formulation)

Brand: Kaike

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: Grapeseed Oil, Apricot Kernel Oil, Hemp Seed Oil, Castor Oil, Blend Of Essential Oils

Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity
